column1: in memory of kathleen madeline ""kathy"" steagall -- woodfin funeral chapels| born: january 26
column3: 2015. this memorial provided by:woodfin funeral chapelsmurfreesboro
column6: 2015 send card. kathleen madeline kathy steagall
column10: 2015. she was a native of bloomington
column12: and daughter of the late arthur h. and mary jane kelly allen. funeral services will be monday june 15 at 1:00 pm at woodfin memorial chapel with dr. f. murray mathis officiating. burial will be in evergreen cemetery. visitation will be from 11:00 am monday until service time at woodfin memorial chapel. mrs. steagall is survived by her husband
column15: kelly (mark) hillhouse and jessica steagall both of murfreesboro; grandchildren
column20: bobby (sue) allen of murfreesboro. she was also preceded in death by a brother
column21: jim allen. mrs. steagall was a member of st rose of lima catholic church and was a retired teacher having taught first grade at rockvale elementary school for 32 years. family and friends will serve as pallbearers. online condolences may be made at www. woodfinchapel. com.
